metadata.title: RA6T2: Set up high voltage motor control development environment

sections.content:
Question:
What do I need to set up high voltage motor control development environment?
Answer:
Please prepare below hardware kits.
High voltage inverter kit (RTK0EM0000B14030BJ)
https://www.renesas.com/RTK0EM0000B14030BJ
RA6T2 CPU board (RTK0EMA270C00000BJ)
https://www.renesas.com/RTK0EMA270C00000BJ
Communication board (RTK0EMXC90S00000BJ)
https://www.renesas.com/RTK0EMXC90S00000BJ
About sample code, Quick Start Guide, etc. that you need are available on Renesas.com.
Suitable Products
RA6T2
